summary: The VA Home Loan Awareness Act of 2025 aims to increase awareness of Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) home loan programs. The bill mandates that the Uniform Residential Loan Application include a disclaimer below the military service question, informing potential borrowers about VA loan eligibility. The bill also requires the Comptroller General to study and report on lender compliance regarding the inclusion of the disclaimer. The act's short title is the VA Home Loan Awareness Act of 2025.
